author: Staff Reporter
text:
Infantry Battalion (Territorial Army) Madras, Redfields, Coimbatore will conduct recruitment for soldiers for enlisting in Territorial Army.

Candidates from Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Maharashtra, Karnataka and Union Territories of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Goa, Daman & Diu, Lakshadweep and Puducherry can appear for the recruitment at PRS Ground in Coimbatore from 6 a.m. from March 1 to 5.

According to an official press release, physical test will be conducted on March 1. On the subsequent days, medical test and personal interview will be conducted for candidates who clear physical test.

The candidates employed in civil organisation or self-employed, ex-NCC cadets, outstanding sportsmen, chefs, masons, artists/painters, LMV/HMV license holders, musicians, wood art workers and dependents of servicemen/ex-servicemen will be given preference.
title: Territorial Army recruitment
